stdio-convert-newlines.help: Enable conversion to standard newlines on stdin/stdout/stderr

stdio-convert-tty-newlines.help: Enable conversion to standard newlines on any tty FILE stream

stdio-buffered-serial.help: Use UARTSerial driver to obtain buffered serial I/O on stdin/stdout/stderr. If false, unbuffered serial_getc and serial_putc are used directly.

stdio-flush-at-exit.help: Enable or disable the flush of standard I/O's at exit.

default-serial-baud-rate.help: Default baud rate for a Serial or RawSerial instance (if not specified in the constructor)

force-non-copyable-error.help: Force compile time error when a NonCopyable object is copied
